channel.title: Anyone have any cheap dedicated hosts?
channel.description: Hey guys, me again. Hmm... I want my server online but my dad thinks it will **** the security up on our computer. So here's my question, i need a [b][u][size=50pt]CHEAP[/size][/u][/b] dedicated host to run my server, and i want anyone who knows one tell me. Well thanks.

item.title: Anyone have any cheap dedicated hosts?
item.dc:creator: @lildude783 lildude783
item.description:
@lildude783 wrote:

the frugooscape.net vps’s have a crappy and confusing way of setting up… unless the dude knows a lot about VPSs and setting them up… i’d say he shouldnt go to frugoo for a VPS, one problem and he could be in a jam for a few days or weeks

Read full topic
item.source: Anyone have any cheap dedicated hosts?
